TopicTitle: [AAR] The Voyage - To Eve and Gilly

Articles.Content:
The Voyage - To Eve and Gilly

Prologue

ERI have started to do researches for cheap and secure interplanetary travels for science missions we have finally been able to start getting results from long journeys to Mun and Minmus and now we can say that Halsey Kerman our designer finally have new concepts that will let us go to other places beyond the Mun and minmus!

- Nice job with the commercial, Bob.

- Thanks, Weren't we suppose to go to the Operations Meeting?

- Oh Yeah, We're lucky we weren't late.

- Let's head over now.

...

- Where's jeb and bob? They we're suppose to be here.

- We're here, Sorry we lost track of time.

- Oh, No worries. Take a seat, We have alot of things to discuss.

- Okay.

- Now As you should already know, My name is Mercher.

- Okay, Hello Mercher.

- So The first thing on our list is the Skalter Lambda, Hows the progress?

- As we speak the ships being worked on, She handles nicely.

- Great. The objective of this mission is to go to Eve and Gilly, Correct?

- That is correct.

- Okay, That's all. You can leave now.

- Okay.

...

- So, You think Mercher was impressed?

- He sounded like it.

- Maybe he was just trying to make us feel good.

- Okay, Do you have to be so negative?

- Well sorry, It's just a possibility.

- It is a possibility, But it's negative one in 100000 Chances that it is true.

- Okay, Well. New topic.

- So what do you think that operations meeting was for?

- Probably he just wanted to know whats going on and what new missions that are being approved.

- Yeah, After all not alot of people tell him whats going on.

- Let's head over to the Vehicle Assembly Building, See how the Skalter's doing.

- Yeah good idea.

...

- So, How's the Skalter doing?

- Great, A few minor problems but we fixed them.

- Good.

- When do you think it'll be finished.

- Probably a few days or weeks, I'm unsure.

- Okay, Well thanks anyways Bill.

- No problem.

- So, Bob. What should we do now?

- Well, it is our break time i think. *Peeks at the clock*-- Yeah, It is our break.

- Okay, So what you want to do?

- How about having something to eat, By then our break will be over.

...

- What's up with the TV?

- I don't know i guess KSC Forgot to pay their TV Bill.

- Oh! Nevermind it works now.

- I didn't even know KSC Had a bill for TV?

- Probably not i was just being sarcastic.

- Well, How does KSC Get their TV Then?

- Probably a satellite, After all the saying is "Whatever KSC needs that normally needs a bill to be paid, Tell the engineers! They'll build a satellite for it."

- Haha, Yeah.

- Well, It's about time to get back to work.

- *Loudspeaker: Jebediah Kerman and Bob Kerman, Report to Hanger Bay 12*

- Hmm, Wonder what that's for?

- Well, We shouldn't keep them waiting.

...

- Yes?

- I was impressed. Your mission is officially Approved.

- Wow! Really?

- Yes. Bob and Jeb Your the head of command for your Mission.

- Oh my, That's so cool! Thank you!

- Your very welcome.

We have no mission progress at the moment, But we are working our hardest to get it completed!
Nice start, it was a nice idea to set Jeb Bill and Bob than any other on the service for the first mission, im currently busy on not dying during reentry or getting captured
